title: Oliver North warned of Osama bin Laden in 1987.
subtitle: Did Oliver North warn Congress of Osama bin Laden during the Iran-Contra hearings?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: During the 1987 Iran-Contra hearings, Oliver North warned Congress that Osama bin Laden was "the worst person alive" and that "the murderers' team should be formed to eliminate him and his men from the face of the earth."
